stepTitle: Use this sample data to construct a 98% confidence interval for the mean number of hours statistics students will spend watching television in one week. (0, 3, 1, 20, 9, 5, 10, 1, 10, 4, 14, 2, 4, 4, 5)
stepBody: Round answers to three decimal place. Wrap answer with parenthesis, separete by a comma, no spacing.
